Title: Plus Kouji
Description: ['A collaboration between ', Ukkari Pénélope, ' and ', Marukome, " for the latter's new product line of amazake, a drink made from fermented rice. ", Plus Kouji, ' is based on a kouji mold (', Aspergillus oryzae, ") enzyme which allows Marukome's product to contain 0% alcohol and be sugar-free so it is perfectly healthy for pregnant women, babies, and the eldery to drink while keeping the same taste as traditional amazake (which is normally sweet and mildly alcoholic)."]
